cells.data:
Minimal Web Designs of Pittsburgh

  • Home
  • Bio
  • About
  • Blog
  • Contact

Here at Minimal Web Designs of Pittsburgh, freelancer Tiffany White builds high quality websites for writers and other freelancers who need one. It's important for writers and other self-starters to have a go-to place for all things you, and get insights on your products and business. The websites that are built consist of the typical website elements-- static page that links to a home page, blog, contact page, and an e-commerce page. If requested, websites using a CMS like WordPress can be built with enough notice.
